belongs_to_collection.name: Mobile Suit Gundam: The Origin Collection

original_title: 機動戦士ガンダム THE ORIGIN II 哀しみのアルテイシア
overview: In the year UC 0071, three years after escaping the Zabi faction on an Ocean Cargo ship, Artesia and Casval are living happily in Andalusia, Spain, Earth under the identities of Sayla Mass and Éduoard Mass, respectively; masquerading as the children of Don Teabolo Mass, a long time friend of their father Zeon Zum Deikun.
title: Mobile Suit Gundam: The Origin II - Artesia's Sorrow
